Rulings.Edison: ● “It can attack once again in a row” means that this card can keep attacking until its condition to attack again is no longer fulfilled. It can make a second, third, fourth, etc attack this way.
Rulings.Tengu: ● “It can attack once again in a row” means that this card can keep attacking until its condition to attack again is no longer fulfilled. It can make a second, third, fourth, etc attack this way.

PSCT.Edison:
You can Ritual Summon this card with "End of the World"
① If this attacking card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: you can activate this effect;  It can attack again in a row.
PSCT.Tengu:
You can Ritual Summon this card with "End of the World"
① If this attacking card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: you can activate this effect;  It can attack again in a row.
